Comment: I hate Trump and Musk with a burning passion, but I work in the DC area as a contractor and these numbers are not out of line for computer specialists.  This is an expensive area to work and live in.  If anything I’m shocked how industry average it is.
Author: KidKilobyte

If he doesn't end up in prison, then it's only because the country never manages to revert to the rule of law and this nightmare never ends.
Author: RealGianath

Comment: Maybe that's average for specialists with years of experience, but not kids who just graduated college. I work with computers for a large company in a similarly expensive area and make less than a third of that. System admins here make less than that. Security admins and systems directors might make close to that amount.
